WorkItem.ClosedComment: This looks very similar to http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/597 and needs to same fix.
WorkItem.Description:
The compile on save(http://typescript.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Compile-on-Save) feature is broken in v0.9 for project with a large number of files and/or long file paths.


2 errors are displayed in the error list and then visual studio becomes unusable:

1. Could not find the file: "<filepath>.ts"
2. The command "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\tsc.exe" "<allTSFiles>"


For now we have to use Web Essentials to compile on save but this takes 15-20 per save.

Looks like the command line limit is being reached as shorting the paths or removing files fixes the issue.
